# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its value and potential impact on your projects, I'm offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,500. This represents a special opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive rate. I trust this offer aligns with your expectations and budget. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
